TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataSourceCacheExpiry extends System.Enum

summary.span: 描述在设置超时时，使用 ASP.NET 缓存机制缓存的数据过期的方式。

span.span: Describes the way data cached using ASP.NET caching mechanisms expires when a time-out is set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举描述如何在 ASP.NET 缓存中过期缓存的数据源控件的数据。The enumeration describes how data cached by a data source control expires in the ASP.NET cache. ASP.NET 数据源控件将基于指定的超时期限，使用设置 ASP.NET 缓存中的数据缓存`CacheDuration`属性。An ASP.NET data source control caches data in the ASP.NET cache based on a specified time-out period, which is set using the `CacheDuration` property. 说明如何使用此超时设置。The describes how this time-out setting is used. 如果该有效期策略设置为绝对，缓存的数据将被丢弃，因为第一次缓存数据，将传递指定的时间量时。If the expiration policy is set to Absolute, the cached data is discarded when the amount of time specified passes since the data was first cached. 如果该有效期策略设置为可调，缓存的数据将被丢弃，仅当未指定的时间内使用的缓存项。If the expiration policy is set to Sliding, the cached data is discarded only when the cache entry has not been used for the amount of time specified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用枚举以声明方式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the enumeration declaratively. 在此示例中，控件用于显示中的数据控件。In this example, a control is used to display data in a control. 控件启用了缓存并将其将设置为可调，缓存数据，只要没有活动。The control has caching enabled and its set to Sliding, to cache data as long as there is activity. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_19sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_19sql/CS/sql19cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_19sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_19sql/VB/sql19vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry Absolute = int32(0)

summary.span: 自数据第一次缓存起经过了 属性指定的时间量后，缓存数据会过期。

span.span: Cached data expires when the amount of time specified by the property has passed since the data was first cached.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry Sliding = int32(1)

summary.span: 仅当在 属性指定的时间量内没有使用缓存项时，缓存数据才会过期。

span.span: Cached data expires only when the cache entry has not been used for the amount of time specified by the property.
